Na putu do tamo skoro pregaze Maynarda koji ih pokuša ubiti. Ekipa deluje u samoobrani i ubije ga, a stiže i šerif koji je odlučan privesti ih u stanicu. Međutim, u tom trenutku stižu kanibali...

programme.title: Trka sa đavolom
programme.desc: Trka sa đavolom Nevine turiste proganjaju satanisti posle nehotičnog posmatranja njihovog izvođenja ljudskog žrtvovanja.

programme.title: Ko se boji duha još?
programme.desc: Ko se boji duha još? Dobitnik Oskara, reditelj Piter Džekson, prikazuje nam svoje neverovatno umeće u ovoj priči o vidovnjaku-prevarantu koji se udružuje sa tri dobroćudna duha ne bi li zaustavio divljanje duha pogubljenog ubice. Jedan od retkih filmova koji uspešno spaja smeh i stravu. Majkl Dž. Foks tumači lik Frenka Banistera, 'isterivača duhova' iz male varoši, udruženog sa duhovima koje bi trebalo da istera. Prevara odlično funkcioniše sve dok jedan moćni duh ne krene u ubilački pohod, primoravajući Frenka da pronađe način da zaustavi ovu dijaboličnu avet u ovom natprirodnom trileru, koji je toliko zabavan da je to strašno!

programme.title: Vukovi na vratima
programme.desc: Vukovi na vratima Četvoro prijatelja se okuplja u otmenoj kući tokom Leta ljubavi, 1969. godine. Nemaju pojma da napolju vrebaju smrtonosni posetioci. Ono što počinje kao jednostavna oproštajna žurka pretvara se u noć iskonskog užasa kad uljezi počnu da muče četvoro ljudi koji se bore za svoje živote usred besmislenog pokolja.

programme.title: Noć strave
programme.desc: Noć strave Čarli je sasvim običan tinejdžer, privržen svojoj devojci i mustangu koji rado vozi. Ali Čarli ima i neobičnu teoriju da u susednoj kući živi vampir. Nažalost po njega, niko u to ne veruje.

programme.title: Natprirodno biće
programme.desc: Natprirodno biće Film je navodno snimljen po delimično istinitoj priči, a radnja se vrti oko žene koja je mučena i seksualno zlostavljana od strane nevidljivog demona.

programme.title: Povratak
programme.desc: Povratak Joanna (S. M. Gellar),j e mlada žena, koja poslovno putuje iz Saint Louisa u Texas. Iako je na radnom mestu besprekorna, stalno je muče noćne more kojih se ne može rešiti: naime, ona u snovima neprestano vidi vrlo živu sliku ubistva nepoznate devojke u senu. Nakon što se u Texasu sretne s klijentom, odlazi u posetu svom usamljenom ocu. Sledećeg jutra odluči krenuti u La Salle, gradić u kojem nikada nije bila, ali koji je stalno u mislima opseda. Unajmljuje sobu u hotelu i upozna se s lokalnim udovcem Terryjem (P. O'Brien) kojem poverava svoj problem. Njene noćne more postaju sve teže, a ona opsednuta željom da sazna odakle sve to...

programme.title: Noć strave
programme.desc: Noć strave Čarli je sasvim običan tinejdžer, privržen svojoj devojci i mustangu koji rado vozi. Ali Čarli ima i neobičnu teoriju da u susednoj kući živi vampir. Nažalost po njega, niko u to ne veruje.

programme.title: Ostrvo doktora Moroa
programme.desc: Ostrvo doktora Moroa Vrsni genetičar doktor Moro eksperimentiranjem na životinjskim genima uspeo je stvoriti novu, superinteligentnu vrstu. Nuspojave nisu izostale...

programme.title: Izbavi Nas od Zla
programme.desc: Izbavi Nas od Zla Pokušavajući da izađe na kraj sa svojim problemima, njujorški policajac Ralf Sarči (Erik Bana) počinje istragu niza uznemirujućih i neobjašnjivih zločina. Udružuje se sa netipičnim sveštenikom (Edgar Ramirez), upoznatim sa obredima egzorcizma, da bi se izborio sa zastrašujućim demonskim silama koje terorišu njihov grad. Film je zasnovan na knjizi koja sadrži detalje stvarnih Sarčijevih slučajeva od kojih se ledi krv u žilama.

programme.title: Đavolja grobnica
programme.desc: Đavolja grobnica Grupa plaćenika pod komandom ratnog veterana Maka, zajedno sa tajanstvenim agentom američke obaveštajne službe Elisom, ima zadatak da spase naučnika koji radi na arheološkim iskopinama otkrvenim duboko u pustinji na Bliskom istoku. Uz pomoć tajanstvenog sveštenika, veteran Mak i njegov tim uskoro će otkriti tajne podzemlja te pustinje. Tajnu skrivenu hiljadama godina koja nije sa ovog sveta. Nakon naglog prekida svake komunikacije s tajnim arheološkim nalazištem na Bliskom istoku, CIA u pomoć šalje grupu elitnih vojnika, na čelu s kapetanom Makom. Mak i njegova ekipa odmah shvataju da je reč o zadatku koji je potpuno drugačiji od svega što su ikada pre radili, a uskoro im postaje jasno da su suočeni sa zlom koje dolazi sa druge planete.

programme.title: Matursko veče
programme.desc: Matursko veče Njeno telo pronađeno je pored napuštene kolibe u šumi. Istina je da su je oni odveli tamo, maltretirali je i pretili joj, sve dok ona nije, u pokušaju da pobegne, pala sa tavana i slomila vrat. Ali, neko je ipak video šta se dogodilo i sada, šest godina kasnije, sprema krvavu osvetu za njihovo matursko veče….

programme.title: Vučija družina
programme.desc: Vučija družina Nakon što je čula bakine zastrašujuće priče, 13-godišnja devojčica ima noćne more koje je pretvaraju u Crvenkapicu….

programme.title: Šuma
programme.desc: Šuma Heather je tinejdžerka koju su roditelji poslali u privatni internat za devojke, koji se nalazi duboko u udaljenoj šumi. Devojka nije srećna i ne snalazi se najbolje sa učenicama iz razreda i školskom upravnicom gospođom Traverse. Trudeći se izvući najbolje iz situacije u kojoj se našla, Heather primećuje kako neki učenici u školi nestaju i čini se da u obližnjoj šumi neka neviđena sila uzima živote tih mladih žena. Ta sila uskoro dolazi i po Heather.

programme.title: Matursko veče

programme.title: Vaskrsli
programme.desc: Vaskrsli Claire postane sumnjičava nakon što njen suprug, hemijski inženjer Charles Dexter Ward, počne izvoditi neobične eksperimente na ljudskim leševima. Ona unajmi privatnog detektiva koji uskoro otkrijte zapanjujući istinu - Charles traga za tajnom večnog života.

programme.title: Sfera
programme.desc: Sfera U dubinama Tihog okeana, pronađeno je nešto što bi moglo da bude najveće otkriće u istoriji: veliki svemirski brod! Vlada SAD šalje tim naučnika koji čine doktor Gudman, biohemičar Halperin, matematičar Adams i astrofizičar Filding na lice mesta. Njihova misija je da istraže tajanstveni teret sa morskog dna i pokušaju da uspostave kontakt sa njegovim putnicima. Dokazi ukazuju da je brod stigao iz budućnosti i da se u njemu nalazi svetleća sfera savršenog oblika koja šalje preteće poruke. A onda, iznenada, veze sa površinom se prekidaju. Tu, u srcu tame, odsečeni od sveta, naučnici će otkriti da se najmračnije mesto nalazi u njihovim umovima.

programme.title: Elizabet Harvest
programme.desc: Elizabet Harvest Elizabeth (Abbey Lee) dolazi sa svojim mužem, briljantnim naučnikom Henryem (Ciaran Hinds), na njegovo fascinantno imanje. Henry joj govori da sve što je njegovo sada je i njeno, osim zaključane sobe u kojoj joj zabranjuje da ulazi. Kada on zbog posla ode na put, Elizabeth odluči da istraži šta je u zaključanoj sobi, te shvata da ona možda nije ono što je mislila da jeste...

programme.title: Pritajeno zlo Apokalipsa
programme.desc: Pritajeno zlo Apokalipsa Mislila je da je slobodna... ali nije bila u pravu. Mila Jovović je još jednom u ulozi Alis, koja se budi iz groznog sna da bi shvatila da su se ostvarili njeni najgori strahovi - krvožedni ne-mrtvaci, protiv kojih se borila zajedno s bivšom elitnom vojnom jedinicom, okomili su se na grad oko tajnog postrojenja korporacije Ambrela. Alis otkriva da je i sama deo eksperimenta Ambrele. Biogenetički je usavršena - što je upravo ono što će joj trebati...

programme.title: Iz pakla
programme.desc: Iz pakla Pet prijateljica, prostitutki, zajednički pokušava da sakupi novac za zaštitu, koji od njih traže članovi bande. Njihova šesta prijateljica En je pronašla bogatog ljubavnika i s njim ima dete. Jednog dana An nestaje, a tajanstveni ubica na posebno okrutan način, ubija ostale pripadnice društva. Istragu vode inspektor Fred i narednik Piter, a budući da ubica dobro poznaje ljudsku anatomiju, stručne savete traže od poznatog hirurga.

programme.title: Jezero straha protiv anakonde
programme.desc: Jezero straha protiv anakonde Anakonde toliko velike da mogu razbiti prosečni terenac. Krokodili jaki da mogu skočiti na brze brodove. Kada ne traže ljudski plen, više su nego spremni krenuti jedan na drugoga. Pripremite se na konstantnu krv kakvu još niste videli u ovoj uzbudljivoj i napetoj bici krokodila i genetski napravljenih anakondi.

programme.title: A Secret to Keep
Feind oder Freund
programme.desc: A Secret to Keep: Directed by Michelle Ouellet. With Jerni Stewart, Kristen Harris, Sarah Constible, Djouliet Amara. Olivia (Jerni Stewart) is Trish's (Kristin Harris) golden child-a straight-A student and captain of her cheerleading squad. But what Trish, a small-town mayor and governor hopeful, doesn't know is that Olivia is hiding an unplanned pregnancy. Desperate not to disappoint her parents and ruin her family's perfect reputation, Olivia promises her baby to Pam (Sarah Constible), the organizer of an underground adoption ring, if Pam can help her deliver in secret. As Trish's once-perfect daughter suddenly shuts her out of her life with lies and sneaking around, Trish's motherly intuition kicks into high gear. Can she uncover the truth about what's wrong with her daughter in time to save her and the baby?" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Ostwind 2
Ostwind 2
programme.desc: Ostwind 2: Directed by Katja von Garnier. With Hanna Binke, Jannis Niewöhner, Marvin Linke, Amber Bongard. Summer vacation. Mika is overjoyed to see Ostwind again. But then she discovers strange wounds on the belly of Ostwind, for which no one has an explanation. Yet this is Kaltenbach verge of bankruptcy! With a heavy heart Mika decides to participate in a variety tournament in which beckons a high prize money. But during training affects Ostwind distracted, often he runs away easily. Mika pursued the black stallion until deep into the forest and is quite surprised: From the thicket a seemingly magical gray mare appears and the two horses dance around lovingly. Suddenly, a strange boy named Milan appears, who says the mare had escaped him. He claimed that he could Help Mika to win the tournament. programme.title: Prince Valiant
Prinz Eisenherz
programme.desc: Prince Valiant: Directed by Anthony Hickox. With Stephen Moyer, Katherine Heigl, Thomas Kretschmann, Edward Fox. In a time now lost in the mists of memory, the great King Arthur rules in the legendary citadel that is Camelot. His Knights of the Round Table perform acts of derring-do and spend their spare time jousting, much to the delight of the local citizens and especially to Princess Ilene, a guest at Camelot. Watching her from afar is a young, inexperienced squire called Valiant, and when the young Welsh princess is sent home to marry Prince Arn, Valiant contrives to accompany her masquerading as Sir Gawain. Meanwhile, the evil sorceress Morgan le Fey, sister to King Arthur, has convinced the tyrannical Sligon, ruler of the Viking kingdom of Thule, that he should steal Arthur's sword, the powerful and magical Excalibur, knowing that its loss could bring about Arthur's downfall. So into the fray comes Sligon's unstable and psychotic brother Thagnar, who manages to steal the sword. Pandemonium reigns. But Valiant is having problems of his own - kidnappers attempt to steal away the Princess, and after various skirmishes, including one with a mysterious character who lives in a cave and purloins treasure, women and other things of value, Valiant manages to return the Princess to her homeland - although he also manages to have a duel with the Princess' jealous fiancé, Prince Arn. All things converge as Valiant is finally informed of his heritage by the stranger from the cave... Boltar of Thule. He informs the lad that he is Prince Valiant, rightful heir to the kingdom of Thule, and with his help, Valiant returns to the land of his birth to rightfully claim what is his." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Prince Valiant
Prinz Eisenherz
programme.desc: Prince Valiant: Directed by Anthony Hickox. With Stephen Moyer, Katherine Heigl, Thomas Kretschmann, Edward Fox. In a time now lost in the mists of memory, the great King Arthur rules in the legendary citadel that is Camelot. His Knights of the Round Table perform acts of derring-do and spend their spare time jousting, much to the delight of the local citizens and especially to Princess Ilene, a guest at Camelot. Watching her from afar is a young, inexperienced squire called Valiant, and when the young Welsh princess is sent home to marry Prince Arn, Valiant contrives to accompany her masquerading as Sir Gawain. Meanwhile, the evil sorceress Morgan le Fey, sister to King Arthur, has convinced the tyrannical Sligon, ruler of the Viking kingdom of Thule, that he should steal Arthur's sword, the powerful and magical Excalibur, knowing that its loss could bring about Arthur's downfall. So into the fray comes Sligon's unstable and psychotic brother Thagnar, who manages to steal the sword. Pandemonium reigns. But Valiant is having problems of his own - kidnappers attempt to steal away the Princess, and after various skirmishes, including one with a mysterious character who lives in a cave and purloins treasure, women and other things of value, Valiant manages to return the Princess to her homeland - although he also manages to have a duel with the Princess' jealous fiancé, Prince Arn. All things converge as Valiant is finally informed of his heritage by the stranger from the cave... Boltar of Thule. He informs the lad that he is Prince Valiant, rightful heir to the kingdom of Thule, and with his help, Valiant returns to the land of his birth to rightfully claim what is his." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

• Adventure
,

,

programme.title: A Secret to Keep
Feind oder Freund
programme.desc: A Secret to Keep: Directed by Michelle Ouellet. With Jerni Stewart, Kristen Harris, Sarah Constible, Djouliet Amara. Olivia (Jerni Stewart) is Trish's (Kristin Harris) golden child-a straight-A student and captain of her cheerleading squad. But what Trish, a small-town mayor and governor hopeful, doesn't know is that Olivia is hiding an unplanned pregnancy. Desperate not to disappoint her parents and ruin her family's perfect reputation, Olivia promises her baby to Pam (Sarah Constible), the organizer of an underground adoption ring, if Pam can help her deliver in secret. As Trish's once-perfect daughter suddenly shuts her out of her life with lies and sneaking around, Trish's motherly intuition kicks into high gear. Can she uncover the truth about what's wrong with her daughter in time to save her and the baby?" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Halo
programme.desc: John und Makee werden sich über ihre gemeinsame Vision klar. Halsey hat eine letzte Chance, ihre Mission zu retten – und dabei sich selbst. Am Ende muss sich jeder für eine Seite entscheiden.

programme.title: Der Fall Phil Spector
programme.desc: Von Großmeister Al Pacino intensiv gespieltes Porträt der Musiklegende Phil Spector. – 2007: Der berühmte Musikproduzent Phil Spector (Al Pacino) steht vor Gericht, weil er in seinem Haus eine junge Schauspielerin erschossen haben soll. Es ist der absolute Tiefpunkt im Leben der Legende, die in den 60er und 70er Jahren mit seinem typischen "Wall of Sound"-Stil u.a. den Ronettes, Tina Turner und den Beatles zu Hits verhalf. Anwältin Linda Kenney Baden (Helen Mirren) entwickelt eine Strategie, den exzentrischen, schwer drogensüchtigen Star zu verteidigen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: Die Studentin April (Alison Pill) hat inzwischen mit der Chemotherapie begonnen, aber ihren Eltern immernoch nicht erzählt, dass sie an Krebs erkrank ist. Sie erzählt Paul (Gabriel Byrne), dass sie in Gedanken mit ihm über den Sinn des Lebens diskutiert. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: Oliver (Aaron Shaw) taucht überraschend in Pauls (Gabriel Byrne) Praxis auf. Der Junge ist aus der Schule abgehauen, weil er von einem Schulkameraden tyrannisiert wurde. Auch zu Hause hat Oliver wieder Ärger. Paul ruft Olivers Vater Luke an und bittet ihn zu einem Gespräch. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: Paul (Gabriel Byrne) besucht seinen Patienten Walter (John Mahoney) im Krankenhaus. Während Walter behauptet, er habe nur eine Lebensmittelvergiftung, glaubt Paul, dass etwas viel Schwerwiegenderes dahinter steckt. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: Paul (Gabriel Byrne) trifft sich mit seiner Ex-Frau Kate (Michelle Forbes). Er erklärt ihr, dass er seine Familie vermisst und sich einen Neuanfang wünscht. Doch Kate muss Paul enttäuschen. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: Mia (Hope Davis) ist deprimiert, da sie doch nicht schwanger ist. Sie erzählt Therapeut Paul (Gabriel Byrne), dass ihre Mutter sie besucht habe, um sie zu trösten. Dabei hat sich die Mutter bei Mia für eine Lüge aus der Vergangenheit entschuldigt. Mia weigert sich jedoch, ihr zu glauben. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: In Treatment – Der Therapeut
programme.desc: April (Alison Pill) ist wütend auf Paul (Gabriel Byrne) weil er ihre Mutter angerufen und sie über Aprils Krebserkrankung informiert hat. Paul argumentiert, dass es sich um einen Notfall gehandelt habe. – Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen.

programme.title: Crime of the Century
Das Verbrechen des Jahrhunderts
programme.desc: Crime of the Century: Directed by Mark Rydell. With Stephen Rea, Isabella Rossellini, J.T. Walsh, Michael Moriarty. In 1932, the nation was shocked when the 14-month-old son of Charles Lindbergh was kidnapped, held for ransom, and murdered. Two years later, Bruno Richard Hauptmann was arrested, convicted, and executed. This film dramatizes the investigation against Hauptmann, the trial, and the execution, painting a picture of a corrupt police force under pressure to finger a killer framing an innocent man by manufacturing evidence, paying-off and blackmailing witnesses, and covering up exculpatory evidence." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: La peste
Die Pest
programme.desc: La peste: Created by Rafael Cobos, Alberto Rodríguez. With Pablo Molinero, Patricia López Arnaiz, Sergio Castellanos, Cecilia Gómez. During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: La peste
Die Pest
programme.desc: La peste: Created by Rafael Cobos, Alberto Rodríguez. With Pablo Molinero, Patricia López Arnaiz, Sergio Castellanos, Cecilia Gómez. During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.desc: Des filles identiques, en tenue militaire, qui se tuent au travail. Une société matriarcale et oligarchique. Que se passerait-il si nous remplacions les abeilles par des humains ? programme.title: Daniel Craig, permis de jouer
programme.desc: Daniel Craig a définitivement transformé l'ADN de 007, en apportant au personnage de Bond une profondeur psychologique et une noirceur qu'aucun de ses illustres prédécesseurs n'avait avant lui. A travers des archives, des extraits de films et entretiens inédits, le documentaire tente de percer le mystère Daniel Craig, le méchant devenu Bond.

programme.title: Les 2 Alfred
Les 2 Alfred
programme.desc: Les 2 Alfred: Directed by Bruno Podalydès. With Denis Podalydès, Bruno Podalydès, Sandrine Kiberlain, Yann Frisch. Alexandre is unemployed and his bank account has been frozen. His wife is on a two-month top secret nuclear submarine mission. While she's away, he has to prove that he can take care of the children and find a job. Following a surreal interview, he is hired at The Box on a trial basis - and thus Alexandre enters the 24-7 world of a greenwashed start-up with a strict no-child policy. He meets Arcimboldo, who juggles different jobs and apps and offers to look after the kids in exchange for accommodation. Between Alexandre's killer colleague Severine, incessant conference calls and endless team building sessions, keeping his secret is no easy challenge." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Coluche: l'histoire d'un mec
Coluche, l'histoire d'un mec
programme.desc: Coluche: l'histoire d'un mec: Directed by Antoine de Caunes. With François-Xavier Demaison, Léa Drucker, Olivier Gourmet, Laurent Bateau. October 1980. Michel Colucci, better known as Coluche, is the French people's favorite comedian. He performs every night to a packed house at the Théâtre du Gymnase. One day, always inclined to go too far, Coluche announces - for laughs - his candidacy for the 1981 French presidential elections. Looked down upon by the professionals of politics, he is soon supported by French voters, who always love when a clown thumbs his nose at the mighty. In a poll published in December, he is even credited with 16% of voting intentions..." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

How to Make Out
programme.desc: T'as pécho?: Directed by Adeline Picault. With Paul Kircher, Inès d'Assomption, Ramzy Bedia, Vincent Macaigne. Arthur, 15, falls in love with Ouassima, who doesn't even look at him. While he has never been in love, she is dating Matt, the handsome kid from college. To get closer to her, Arthur gathers a group of single losers and offers to give them lessons in fishing, at 10 euros per lesson. programme.title: Tendre poulet
Tendre poulet
programme.desc: Tendre poulet: Directed by Philippe de Broca. With Annie Girardot, Philippe Noiret, Catherine Alric, Hubert Deschamps. Romance in the prime of life. When Lise's car bumps Antoine's bike, they recognize each other from a brief fling 20 years before while at the Sorbonne. He's now a professor of Greek; she's loathe to tell him she's a police inspector. A call interrupts their first dinner date: a Deputy of the National Assembly has been murdered. She has a suspect, another Deputy, and must track him while deflecting Antoine's eye from her vocation. All roads in the inquiry lead to Christine Vallier, the dead Deputy's mistress, a beguiling 22-year-old whose mother ran the Assembly's snack bar. When more deputies die and Antoine learns Lise's identity, she must act quickly solve the crime and save her future." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: L'image originelle : Michel Ocelot
programme.desc: Depuis la sortie de Kirikou, qui a bouleversé l'univers du film d'animation, la vie de Michel Ocelot a changé. Le réalisateur, qui a triomphé en osant porter à l'écran l'histoire désormais célèbre de l'intrépide petit africain, revient sur la genèse de son travail, son application extrême à réaliser les moindres détails du film, ainsi que son goût pour l'inconnu et l'étranger. Marqué par une enfance passée en Guinée, à Conakry, dans les années 1950, il sait mieux que personne transmettre les valeurs de l'Afrique.
programme.category: Documentaire Cinéma

programme.title: Vers la bataille
Vers la bataille
programme.desc: Vers la bataille: Directed by Aurélien Vernhes-Lermusiaux. With Malik Zidi, Leynar Gomez, Thomas Chabrol, Olivier Chantreau. The story unfolds around the year 1860. Louis, a photographer, convinces the general of the French Army to send him to Mexico to photograph the colonial war that is ravaging the country. Once he is there, nothing goes as planned. Never in the right place at the right time to see the battles, Louis can't snap a single picture of the war. But his encounter with Pinto, a Mexican peasant, changes his destiny. It leads him to discover neither glory nor wealth, but a way to confront the ghosts of his past." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Tendre poulet
Tendre poulet
programme.desc: Tendre poulet: Directed by Philippe de Broca. With Annie Girardot, Philippe Noiret, Catherine Alric, Hubert Deschamps. Romance in the prime of life. When Lise's car bumps Antoine's bike, they recognize each other from a brief fling 20 years before while at the Sorbonne. He's now a professor of Greek; she's loathe to tell him she's a police inspector. A call interrupts their first dinner date: a Deputy of the National Assembly has been murdered. She has a suspect, another Deputy, and must track him while deflecting Antoine's eye from her vocation. All roads in the inquiry lead to Christine Vallier, the dead Deputy's mistress, a beguiling 22-year-old whose mother ran the Assembly's snack bar. When more deputies die and Antoine learns Lise's identity, she must act quickly solve the crime and save her future." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: On a volé la cuisse de Jupiter
On a volé la cuisse de Jupiter
programme.desc: On a volé la cuisse de Jupiter: Directed by Philippe de Broca. With Annie Girardot, Philippe Noiret, Francis Perrin, Catherine Alric. Antoine, a professor of Greek, and Lise, a police inspector, honeymoon in Greece. There they meet a young couple, Charles, an archaeologist, and Agnes, a dishy flirt. Charles unearths the lovely buttocks of a classical statue and is determined to donate it to the Louvre. Agnes wants to sell it and gets a handsome local sailor to take it for an appraisal. When the sailor is murdered, the police suspect Charles and arrest Antoine as his accomplice. Lise swings into action, but before she can clear the men, Agnes springs them from jail, and now Lise must help them elude the police, find the real murderer, and recover the statue fragment. More art goes missing. What is the statue's secret?" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Bébert et l'omnibus
Bébert et l'omnibus
programme.desc: Bébert et l'omnibus: Directed by Yves Robert. With Martin Lartigue, Blanchette Brunoy, Pierre Mondy, Jean Richard. While their parents are busy shopping in a department store, Tiennot, who would rather chase girls, buys the complicity of Bébert, his little brother. In the train on the way back home, Tiennot, infuriated by his whims, leaves Bébert in the last car, which happens to be separated from the train and headed in another direction. Panic in the family: where on earth is Bébert? In fact, the little rascal has been taken in by the station master of Verneuil L'Etang, where he has a great time wreaking havoc in the SNCF network. A good-natured inspector is called on the spot and Bébert is finally reunited with his family." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: One Potato, Two Potato
Le procès de Julie Richards
One Potato, Two Potato
programme.desc: One Potato, Two Potato: Directed by Larry Peerce. With Barbara Barrie, Bernie Hamilton, Richard Mulligan, Harry Bellaver. In his wanderlust, Joe Cullen moves from the US to South America to work in a mining camp, he leaving behind his wife Julie and their infant daughter, Ellen Mary. After Joe stops writing and sending money, Julie, not expecting Joe ever to return to her in he being dissatisfied with married life, files for divorce, and moves with Ellen Mary to the town of Howard to start life anew working in the payroll department of Howard Factory. Among the people she meets and befriends in Howard is coworker Frank Richards, the friendship with him which slowly but eventually blossoms into romance. Despite some opposition from his parents, especially his father, Frank and Julie get married, Frank, in the process, becoming the only father that Ellen Mary has really ever known, a loving one at that. After Julie and Frank have a child of their own, William so named after his father, Joe, four years after his departure, returns solely wanting to reestablish a relationship of sorts with now adolescent Ellen Mary. After Joe sees Julie's new life, he changes his want from that relationship with Ellen Mary to suing for full custody. The sole issue, originally with William's Sr.'s objection to the marriage, and to Joe's want for full custody, is that Julie and Joe, and thus by association Ellen Mary, are white, while Frank is black." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

credits.actor: Barbara Barrie / Julie Cullen Richards, Bernie Hamilton / Frank Richards, Richard Mulligan / Joe Cullen, Harry Bellaver / Judge Powell, Robert Earl Jones / William Richards, Vinnette Carroll / Martha Richards

programme.desc: Les mauvaises herbes: Directed by Louis Bélanger. With Alexis Martin, Gilles Renaud, Emmanuelle Lussier Martinez, Mimi Côté. programme.title: Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle
Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle
programme.desc: Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle: Directed by Frank Beauvais. January 2016. The love story that brought me to this village in Alsace where I live ended six months ago. At 45, I am now alone, without a car, a job or any real prospects, surrounded by luxuriant nature, the proximity of which is not enough to calm the deep distress into which I am plunged. France, still in shock from the November terror attacks, is in a state of emergency. I feel helpless, I suffocate with contained rage. I am lost and I watch four to five films a day. I decide to record this stagnation, not by picking up a camera but by editing shots from the stream of films I watch." data-id="main"/><metacontent="
programme.category: • Documentary

programme.title: Une affaire de goût
Une affaire de goût
programme.desc: Une affaire de goût: Directed by Bernard Rapp. With Bernard Giraudeau, Jean-Pierre Lorit, Florence Thomassin, Charles Berling. Nicolas, a handsome, young waiter, is befriended by Frédéric Delamont, a wealthy middle-aged businessman. Delamont, a man of power, influence and strictly refined tastes, is immediately smitten by Nicolas' charm. Lonely and phobic, Delamont offers Nicolas a lucrative job as his personal food taster. In spite of their differences, a close friendship begins to emerge between the two men. However, their bond of trust and admiration soon spirals downward into a dangerous game of deceit and obsession for which neither is prepared." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Une affaire de goût
Une affaire de goût
programme.desc: Une affaire de goût: Directed by Bernard Rapp. With Bernard Giraudeau, Jean-Pierre Lorit, Florence Thomassin, Charles Berling. Nicolas, a handsome, young waiter, is befriended by Frédéric Delamont, a wealthy middle-aged businessman. Delamont, a man of power, influence and strictly refined tastes, is immediately smitten by Nicolas' charm. Lonely and phobic, Delamont offers Nicolas a lucrative job as his personal food taster. In spite of their differences, a close friendship begins to emerge between the two men. However, their bond of trust and admiration soon spirals downward into a dangerous game of deceit and obsession for which neither is prepared." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

Les mauvaises herbes
programme.desc: Les mauvaises herbes: Directed by Louis Bélanger. With Alexis Martin, Gilles Renaud, Emmanuelle Lussier Martinez, Mimi Côté. Jacques is an actor who runs away to the countryside to escape his gambling debts. He meets Simon, a rough and wily farmer who manipulates him into a business relationship. After a difficult start, the men help each other grow marijuana. They happen to meet Francesca, a sharp young woman who soon embraces their venture. programme.title: Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle
Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle
programme.desc: Ne croyez surtout pas que je hurle: Directed by Frank Beauvais. January 2016. The love story that brought me to this village in Alsace where I live ended six months ago. At 45, I am now alone, without a car, a job or any real prospects, surrounded by luxuriant nature, the proximity of which is not enough to calm the deep distress into which I am plunged. France, still in shock from the November terror attacks, is in a state of emergency. I feel helpless, I suffocate with contained rage. I am lost and I watch four to five films a day. I decide to record this stagnation, not by picking up a camera but by editing shots from the stream of films I watch." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Le colonel Chabert
Le colonel Chabert
programme.desc: Le colonel Chabert: Directed by Yves Angelo. With Gérard Depardieu, Fanny Ardant, Fabrice Luchini, André Dussollier. Colonel Chabert has been severely wounded in the French-Russian Napoleonic war to the point that the medical examiner has signed his death certificate. When he regains his health and memory, he goes back to Paris, where his "widow", Anne has married the Count Ferraud and is financing his rise to power using Chabert's money. Chabert hires a lawyer to help him get back his money and his honor." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

Irmãs Com Transistores
programme.desc: Uma saudável e necessária revisão histórica, narrada por Laurie Anderson, que coloca as mulheres na linha da frente no que toca ao impacto e contribuições da presença feminina na história da música eletrónica.

programme.title: The Curse Of Von Dutch: A Brand To Die For, 1
programme.desc: Um ex-traficante de drogas, um gangster novato e um colecionador de arte lançam uma marca que se tornou um clássico da moda americana.

programme.title: Era Uma Vez a Máfia
programme.desc: No aniversário do assassinato dos famosos juízes que entraram em guerra contra a máfia, o realizador Franco Maresco revisita a memória histórica italiana e interroga-se sobre os ideais que ficaram até aos dias de hoje, especialmente na Sicília.

programme.title: As Mil e Uma
programme.desc: Quando Iris conhece Renata, uma jovem com um passado difícil, ela sente-se imediatamente atraída por ela. Iris terá que superar os seus medos e lutar com as suas inseguranças para experimentar o primeiro amor.

programme.title: The Curse Of Von Dutch: A Brand To Die For, 2
programme.desc: Um novo investidor na marca Von Dutch causa disrupções criativas, uma série de rescisões, e um comportamento assassino.

programme.title: O Último Imperador
programme.desc: A vida de Pu Yi, último imperador da China que morreu em 1967 e que, depois de ´reeducado´ nas prisões comunistas, acabou os seus dias como jardineiro.

programme.title: Oscar Peterson: Black + White
programme.desc: Uma celebração da vida e obra do lendário pianista de jazz canadiano Oscar Peterson.

programme.title: Magic In The Mountains
programme.desc: Documentário sobre a história extraordinária de como uma pequena cidade americana se tornou anfitriã dos Jogos Olímpicos de Inverno de 1960 e, com a ajuda de Walt Disney, mudou os jogos para sempre.

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Truman Capote cria uma ligação com 2 assassinos notórios para escrever um romance sobre a história do seu crime.

programme.title: A Via Láctea
programme.desc: Pierre e Paul são dois peregrinos que estão a caminho de Santiago de Compostela. É uma viagem no espaço que se desdobra pelo tempo, e que lhes permite percorrer os grandes dogmas que pontuaram a história do catolicismo.

programme.title: Ruth
programme.desc: Em 1960, um jovem futebolista moçambicano chega a Lisboa e é apanhado no meio de uma intensa rivalidade clubística. Enquanto os ventos da mudança começam a soprar no país, Eusébio começa o seu duro trajeto até se transformar naquilo que é: uma lenda.

programme.title: O Apartamento
programme.desc: O ambicioso C.C. ´Bud´ Baxter consegue uma série de promoções não merecidas, emprestando o seu apartamento como esconderijo para os seus chefes mulherengos. Mas Baxter apaixona-se pela amante do seu patrão e os problemas não tardam a surgir.

programme.title: Três Verões
programme.desc: Madalena gere a casa de um casal rico, mas sonha comprar um terreno para abrir o seu próprio negócio. Pede ajuda ao seu patrão, que lhe empresta dinheiro a ser descontado no seu salário, sem imaginar o quanto vai ser envolvida em negócios obscuros.

ذا بيغ سيك
programme.desc: Kumail a budding stand-up comedian, meets Emily. But a sudden illness sets in forcing Emily to be put into a medically-induced coma. Kumail must navigate being a comedian, dealing with tragic illness. كميل ممثل كوميدي ناشئ، يلتقي بإيميلي. لكن المرض المفاجئ أدى إلى إجبار إيميلي على الدخول في غيبوبة طبية. يجب أن يتعامل كميل مع كونه كوميديًا، و مع مرض مأساوي.

programme.title: Hot Air
هوت إير
programme.desc: A right wing talk show host s life takes a sudden turn when his 16 year old niece comes crashing into his life. تأخذ حياة مضيف برنامج حواري يميني منعطفًا مفاجئًا عندما تدخل ابنة أخته البالغة من العمر 16 عامًا على حياته.

programme.title: Promised Land
بروميسد لاند
programme.desc: Drama with Matt Damon and John Krasinksi. A representative for a gas corporation goes to a small farming town to offer big money in exchange for drilling rights. What seems like an easy job gets complicated when an environmentalist offers another side to the story. دراما من بطولة مات ديمون وجون كراسنكسي. يذهب ممثل لشركة غاز إلى بلدة زراعية صغيرة من أجل عرض كمية كبيرة من المال في مقابل الحصول على حقوق التنقيب، لكن الأمر يصبح أكثر تعقيداً عندما يعرض خبير بيئي جانباً آخر من القصة.

programme.desc: David, an urban teenager s journey to rural Montana to go hunt big game with his estranged father, Cal. programme.title: Pineapple Express
باينابل اكسبريس
programme.desc: Action comedy with Seth Rogen, James Franco. A process server and habitual pot smoker who witnessed a murder but left his rare strain of marijuana roach at the scene, attempts to flee the city with his dealer when a drug lord and crooked cop trace the butt back to them. أكشن وكوميدي من بطولة سيث روغان وجيمس فرانكو. يحاول مدخن حشيشة، يشهد على وقوع جريمة قتل ولكن يخلف وراءه آثاراً من سلالة نادرة من الماريجوانا، الهروب مع صديقه الذي يزوده بها، بعدما يبدأ زعيم مخدرات وشرطي فاسد بتعقب آثارهما من خلالها.

programme.title: The Big Sick
ذا بيغ سيك
programme.desc: Kumail a budding stand-up comedian, meets Emily. But a sudden illness sets in forcing Emily to be put into a medically-induced coma. Kumail must navigate being a comedian, dealing with tragic illness. كميل ممثل كوميدي ناشئ، يلتقي بإيميلي. لكن المرض المفاجئ أدى إلى إجبار إيميلي على الدخول في غيبوبة طبية. يجب أن يتعامل كميل مع كونه كوميديًا، و مع مرض مأساوي.

programme.title: Hot Air
هوت إير
programme.desc: A right wing talk show host s life takes a sudden turn when his 16 year old niece comes crashing into his life. تأخذ حياة مضيف برنامج حواري يميني منعطفًا مفاجئًا عندما تدخل ابنة أخته البالغة من العمر 16 عامًا على حياته.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice And Zombies
برايد بريجيدس أند زومبيز
programme.desc: Five sisters in 19th century England must cope with the pressures to marry while protecting themselves from a growing population of zombies. يجب على خمس شقيقات في إنجلترا في القرن التاسع عشر التغلب على ضغوط الزواج مع حماية أنفسهن من عدد متزايد من الزومبي.

programme.title: Walking Out
واكينغ آوت
programme.desc: David, an urban teenager s journey to rural Montana to go hunt big game with his estranged father, Cal. As they ascend deep into the wilderness, father and son struggle to connect on any level. يتوجه ديفيد مراهق من المدينة الى ريف مونتانا للصيد في لعبة كبيرة مع والده كال وبينما يتعمقان في البرية يحاول الأب والابن التواصل بأي شكل من الأشكال.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice And Zombies
برايد بريجيدس أند زومبيز
programme.desc: Five sisters in 19th century England must cope with the pressures to marry while protecting themselves from a growing population of zombies. يجب على خمس شقيقات في إنجلترا في القرن التاسع عشر التغلب على ضغوط الزواج مع حماية أنفسهن من عدد متزايد من الزومبي.

programme.title: The Monuments Men
ذا مونيومينتس مين
programme.desc: As the Third Reich begins to topple, an incredible true story of the seven art historians and museum curators who went behind enemy lines during WWII on a mission to recover some of the world's greatest works of art. George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray star. بينما تقترب ألمانيا النازية من السقوط، نتابع قصة حقيقية مذهلة لسبع مؤرخين للفن وأمناء للمتاحف ذهبوا إلى ما وراء خطوط العدو خلال الحرب العالمية الثانية في مهمة لاستعادة بعض من أهم الأعمال الفنية في العالم. بطولة جورج كلوني، مات ديمون وبيل موراي.

programme.title: Please Stand By
بليز ستاند باي
programme.desc: A young autistic woman runs away from her caregiver in an attempt to submit her manuscript to a 'Star Trek' writing competition. امرأة شابة مصابة بالتوحد تهرب من مقدم الرعاية لها في محاولة لتقديم مخطوطتها إلى مسابقة كتابة ستار تريك.

programme.title: The Nice Guys
ذا نايس غايز
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star. في السبعينيات من القرن الماضي في لوس أنجلوس يقوم شخصان ذو نظرة ثاقبة بالتحقيق في فتاة مفقودة والموت الغامض لنجمة إباحية.

programme.title: The Big Sick

programme.title: Journey's End
جيرنيز إيند
programme.desc: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate. تدور أحداث الفيلم في مخبأ داخل أيسن عام 1918 ، وهي قصة مجموعة من الضباط البريطانيين بقيادة الضابط الشاب ستانهوب المضطرب عقليا وهم ينتظرون مصيرهم.

programme.title: Colossal
كولوسال
programme.desc: Gloria is forced to leave her life in NY and move back to her hometown. When news reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she realises that she is connected to this phenomenon. تُجبر غلوريا على ترك حياتها في نيويورك والعودة إلى مسقط رأسها. عندما تظهر التقارير الإخبارية أن مخلوقًا عملاقًا يدمر سيؤول عنده تدرك أن الأمر مرتبط بها.

programme.title: The Founder
ذا فاوندر
programme.desc: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness. قصة راي كروك البائع الذي حول مطعم ماكدونالدز للوجبات السريعة المبتكر من قبل شقيقين إلى أكبر شركة مطاعم في العالم مع مزيد من الطموح والمثابرة والقسوة.

programme.title: Journey's End
جيرنيز إيند
programme.desc: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate. تدور أحداث الفيلم في مخبأ داخل أيسن عام 1918 ، وهي قصة مجموعة من الضباط البريطانيين بقيادة الضابط الشاب ستانهوب المضطرب عقليا وهم ينتظرون مصيرهم.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
بيغ ماماز هاوس
programme.desc: Comedy with Martin Lawrence. When a street-smart FBI agent is sent to Georgia to protect a beautiful single mother and her son from an escaped convict, he is forced to impersonate a crass Southern granny known as Big Momma in order to remain incognito. كوميدي من بطولة مارتن لورانس. عندما يتم إرسال عميل أف بي آي ذكي إلى جورجيا لحماية أم عازبة جميلة وابنها من متهم هارب، يُجبر العميل على انتحال شخصية جدة فظة من الجنوب تدعى بيغ ماما ليحافظ على سرية هويته.

programme.title: The Exception
ذا إكسبشن
programme.desc: The abdicated German emperor, Kaiser Wilhelm II, is still considered an influential man. As a result, to avert a possible attempt against the life, Stefan Brandt, is put in charge of his security. لا يزال يعتبر الإمبراطور الألماني المتنحي عن العرش القيصر فيلهلم الثاني رجلاً مؤثراً. نتيجة لذلك و لتجنب محاولة محتملة لاغتياله تم تعيين ستيفان براندت مسؤولاً عن أمنه.

programme.title: Genius
جينياس
programme.desc: A chronicle of Max Perkins's time as the book editor at Scribner, where he oversaw works by Thomas Wolfe, Ernest Hemingway, F. Scott Fitzgerald and others. تاريخ من زمن ماكس بيركنز كمحرر للكتب في سكرايبنر حيث أشرف على أعمال توماس وولف وإرنست همنغواي وإف سكوت فيتزجيرالد وآخرين.

programme.title: Permanent
بيرمينانت
programme.desc: Permanent is a comedy about bad hair, adolescence, and socially awkward family members. It involves life-altering permanents and poorly-made toupees. Obstacles to daily survival ensue. بيرمينانت هو كوميديا ​​عن الشعر السيئ والمراهقة وأفراد الأسرة المحرجين اجتماعياويتحدث عن متغيرات الحياة والشعر المستعار سيئ الصنع والعقبات اليومية في الحياة.

programme.title: King Lear
كينغ لير
programme.desc: An aging King invites disaster when he abdicates to his corrupt, toadying daughters, and rejects his loving and honest one. ملك كبير في السن يدعو إلى الكارثة عندما يتنازل عن بناته الفاسدة ، ويرفض حبيبته الصادقة.
